readValue

public boolean readValue(Parameter prop,
                         Element elem,
                         Map<String,Scenario> scenarios)
                  throws DataException
Description copied from interface: ValueReader
Tries to read property value from xml property element, if reading was successfull method must set property value.

Specified by:
readValue in interface ValueReader
Parameters:
prop - property to set value
elem - property xml element
scenarios - previously read scenarios with ids
Returns:
true if reading was successfull
Throws:
DataException - if value has wrong format

writeValue

public boolean writeValue(Constructor xml,
                          Type type,
                          Object value)
Description copied from interface: ValueWriter
Writes value of specified type to property xml node. After writing xml constructor must be on same node, as before.

Specified by:
writeValue in interface ValueWriter
Parameters:
xml - property node
type - type of value
value - to write
Returns:
true if it was known type and value was written
